sent.orig: "Two will be enough for grandad, the rest are yours."
Our little Cody, now turned one, waves night night to his grandad angel in the sky.
sent.trans: 我们的小Cody,已经学会在晚上对着天空与他的外公说话了。

sent.orig: My grandad wore clogs to the day he died.
sent.trans: 我爷爷一直到死的那一天都穿木底鞋。

sent.orig: Here you are, Nicola. Do you like them? Yes, Grandad.
sent.trans: 给你，尼古拉。你喜欢它们吗？是的，爷爷。

sent.orig: Grandad is very particular about his food.
